title: Champion Mastery System
body: I think it would be pretty cool if once you reach mastery rank 5 for a champion in the loading screen when you use that champion it shows kills/assists and wins on your boarder or something or maybe also display your champions points?

replies.body:
I think it's irrelevant
those things don't reflect 100% of your "mastery"

In fact a lot of people get lucky and carried a lot as their favourite champ
